article_title: Doctor shortage hits area hardest in internal medicine
article_text:
JANESVILLE--Medicine was one of the few things Dr. Kevin Sponseller could see himself enjoying for a lifetime. He looked into...

article_metadata.Description: As the nation struggles with a long-term physician shortage and an aging population, family medicine and internal medicine are specialties area providers say can be tough to recruit.
article_metadata.author: Gina Duwe
